fr.enac.audio

Class MaryTTS

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.enac.audio.MaryTTS
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AudioPlayer

    public class MaryTTS
extends java.lang.Object
implements AudioPlayer
    Implementation of AudioPlayer using MaryTTS API, the synthesizer retains in the project.
